ld.headline: Why Voice Recording is the Heart of Great Meeting Notes
ld.description: Minutes.AI combines accurate transcription with clear voice recording to preserve the true atmosphere of your meetings.

hero.h1: Don't Just Read the Minutes. Replay the Atmosphere.
hero.tagline: AI transcription services are everywhere. But text alone is flat. To truly understand a decision, you need to hear the voice behind it.

intro.h2: The Missing Piece in AI Transcription
intro.p1: Notta, Otter, tl;dv, Minutes.AI... the market is flooded with 'AI Meeting Assistants'. They are all excellent at turning speech into text. But even the best AI in the world misses one crucial thing when it only generates text:

problem.p1: Imagine reading this line in your meeting minutes:
problem.quote: “The team unanimously decided to go with Plan A.”
problem.p2: On paper, this is a fact. But in reality, what actually happened?

scenarios.title: Scenario 1: High Energy
scenarios.desc: Everyone was excited, shouting 'Yes!' and high-fiving. The momentum is unstoppable.

scenarios.title: Scenario 2: Reluctant Compromise
scenarios.desc: There was a long silence. Finally, someone sighed, 'I guess Plan A is the only option left...' and others nodded strictly out of fatigue.

problem.summary: These two scenarios have opposite meanings for your business strategy, yet the text transcript looks exactly the same. This is the 'depth' of a meeting that text alone destroys.

solution.p1: We believe that information without context is dangerous. That's why Minutes.AI isn't just a summarizer—it's a high-fidelity voice recorder.
solution.p2: We refuse to discard the audio data after processing. By keeping the original voice recording linked to the transcript, we allow you to travel back in time.
features: **Contextual Playback**: Tap any sentence to hear exactly how it was said.
**Tone Analysis**: Was the stakeholder angry or joking? Verify it instantly.
**Complete Archive**: Your minutes are the summary; the audio is the proof.

cta.p1: Don't settle for flat text. Experience the trinity of modern meeting records: Summaries, Full Transcripts, and Original Voice Audio.
